overview:
After graduating in Philosophy from the University of North London Sarah worked in London for eighteen years gaining experience in a variety of PA and marketing roles.

Working in the publicity department of the multi-award winning Building Design Partnership she helped to organise press and promotional activities for high profile projects such as the Royal Opera House and National Maritime Museum.

Before joining NorthStar Equity Investors in April 2004, Sarah worked in Westminster for The Whitehall and Industry Group organising conferences and events networking high-level private and public sector members.

Contact: sarah.richards@nstarfinance.com
